name: WTF.exe (Remake)
description:
This is my third Pokemon game ever made! :D

And it is a remake of a more less known Pokemon creepy game that only a few know, that was named WTF.exe.

I don't know why this strange title, haha, but that's it. :)

Plot:

"In a   normal day at Lavender Town, a kid named Steve has to go to deliver a letter for his aunt, but something creepy will happen, involving something about his past.

He will able to enclose those past seams? a̵̛̞͕̳̺͔̝̓̄̑̈͛͐͠ņ̷̜̥̻͎̗̣̻̣͚͇͕̦͂̃̓̌̇̉͝ͅd̸̨̧̋͗̑̍̽̎̈́̅ ̷̢̻͕̙͚̙̥̘͍̦͙͂́͐͂̃̎̔̄͘͘͜͜t̴̬̫̜̑ȯ̴̢̻̤̦̲̫̗̩̼̽̏̾́̾͊́͑̆͜ͅ ̷͕͇̗͉͓͔̜͕͖͊͗̈̐̎̈͛̇̃͝s̶̡̊̈̒ũ̵̻̼͇̱͍̖̜̺͖͔͙͉̩̙r̶̡̛̤̣̞͉̞̬̀̒̿̍̽̃͆̚̚͜v̶̧̡̡͕͕̪̻̖̊̓́͝í̸̢̓̒̌̀͠ͅv̶͈͕̀͑̍͒̾̆͛̍̈́̃͑̕̚͘e̷̢̻̮̦̮͖̪̼͗͐̑̿͂̓̎̎̀͐̕̚͝͠͠ͅ?   "

This is a Pokemon creepy game based on Pokemon Death Version i think, another creepy game, the original creator of the original "WTF.exe" was a guy with the nickname of IulianSimion, he made it in 2016 circa, and he removed it some time after and that's why i remade it, it is lost and i wanted it back! :D

Obviously i made it more better compared to how the original game was. :)

And i decided also to change and make a real map, and not that paint maze, and i added a true story, a really good one!

I did it more obviously for fun, haha

The game as it is a remake, it is not perfect, also because the original one didn't even had a story, and inventing one from 0 was really difficult, but i did my best, and i told it so you know it. :) 

And i really hope you will like it! :D
